data.text: Di madagoaa Rehoboam ne haganoho ono mogobuna king, mee mo ana daangada huogodoo ga diiagi nnaganoho Dimaadua.
I lodo di lima ngadau Rehoboam nogo dagi, Dimaadua gu hagaduadua digaula i di nadau dee hagalongo. King Shishak o Egypt gu heebagi gi Jerusalem

gi ana waga dauwa hongo henua e mana maa lua lau (1,200) ge modoono mana (60,000) digau llele nia hoodo, mo ana gau dauwa dogologo e deemee di dau, hagapuni ang gi nia hagabuulinga dauwa mai Libya, Sukkite mo Ethiopia.
Mee guu kumi nia waahale o Judah ala gu abaaba gi mau dangi, ga hanadu gaa tugi i Jerusalem.

Soukohp Shemaiah gaa hana gi di King Rehoboam mo nia dagi Judah ala ne dagabuli i Jerusalem belee llele gi daha mo Shishak. Mee ga helekai gi digaula, “Aanei nnelekai Dimaadua adu gi goodou: ‘Goodou gu diiagi Au, dolomeenei gei Au gu diiagi goodou guu wanga goodou gi Shishak.’”
Di king mo nia dagi guu donu ang gi ginaadou bolo ginaadou gu ihala, ga helekai, “Nia mee ala e hai go Dimaadua le e hai donu.”

Di madagoaa Dimaadua ne gidee di mee deenei, Mee ga helekai labelaa gi Shemaiah, gaa hai gi mee, “Idimaa digaula gu helekai bolo ginaadou gu ihala, Au ga hagalee daaligi digaula gi daha. Malaa di madagoaa Shishak ga heebagi gi digaula, digaula ga deloaa di mouli. Jerusalem ga de longono ia di maaloo o dogu hagawelewele hagatau,
gei Shishak ga hagamagedaa digaula, gei digaula ga iloo di mee dela e hai geegee i mehanga di hai hege mai gi di Au mo di hai hege gi nia dagi o henuailala.”

King Shishak gu hanimoi gi Jerusalem guu kae nia goloo maluagina ala nogo i lodo di Hale Daumaha mo di hale king. Mee guu kae nia mee huogodoo ngaadahi mo nia mee abaaba dangada ala ne hai go di King Solomon gi nia goolo.
Rehoboam guu hai ana mee abaaba dangada baalanga mmee e pono nia maa, guu wanga nia maa gi nia daangada hagaloohi nia bontai di hale di king gi benabena ina.
Nia madagoaa huogodoo di king ma gaa hana gi di Hale Daumaha, digau hagaloohi ga aamo nia maa, gaa lawa ga gaamai labelaa gi muli gi di ruum digau hagaloohi.
Idimaa mee gu haga hila ia gi lala gi Dimaadua, gei di hagawelewele Dimaadua digi daaligidia a mee, gei nia mee gu humalia i baahi Judah.

Rehoboam ne dagi Jerusalem ga hagamaaloo aga ono mogobuna king. Mee ne madahaa maa dahi ono ngadau i dono madagoaa ne hai di king, gaa dagi nia ngadau e madangaholu maa hidu i Jerusalem, di waahale dela ne hilihili go Dimaadua mai i lodo tenua hagatau Israel belee hai di gowaa e hagalaamua ai dono ingoo. Tinana Rehoboam la go Naamah mai tenua go Ammon.
Rehoboam guu hai nia mee huaidu idimaa mee digi hagamada e halahala di hiihai o Dimaadua.

Nnegau Rehoboam mai taamada gaa tugi gi di hagaodi, mo nia ingoo dono madahaanau la guu hihi i lodo Di Kai a Soukohp Shemaiah mo i lodo Di Kai a Soukohp Iddo. Rehoboam mo Jeroboam nogo hagadau heebagi i nau mehanga i nia madagoaa huogodoo.
Rehoboam gaa made gaa danu i lodo di waa daalunga o nia king i lodo di Waahale o David, gei tama daane a maa go Abijah gaa pono di lohongo o maa gaa king.
